articles.author: Piper Hudspeth Blackburn
articles.title: Musk to visit Pentagon following an invitation from Secretary Hegseth - CNN
articles.description: Elon Musk will pay a visit to the Pentagon on Friday after the tech billionaire received an invitation from Secretary Pete Hegseth, the Defense Department said late Thursday evening.
articles.content:
Elon Musk will pay a visit to the Pentagon on Friday after the tech billionaire received an invitation from Secretary Pete Hegseth, the Defense Department said late Thursday evening.
